column5: Had a great time tonight at the show. Pretty sure I recognized some OFC'ers there as well. It was cool that they had three folks with very dynamic presentations about all kinds of techniques. Also had the chance to meet Dave, JP and Paul as well. Really cool to see sponsors like Subway being so generous   If you can make the show tonight in Brantford you should go!  scugog
Ill be there!!  I cant wait!
